channel.title: You are the best if you can answer this
channel.description: when ever i got to rspscoding to use there webclient maker, i make the webclient (erasedpkz) but then when i go onto the webclient it says error click for details. then i click details and it says client.class not found. i redownloaded the source but still get the error. i used another computer in my house to run the server on there but still the same error. can somebody please help me????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Jacob_:

Protip: don’t use a loader, make your own web client.

This^ + with erased pkz i believe u only need to slightly change 2 paths a name in signlink and jar and sign it… so its not even hard o.0.
Error connecting to server means that there is an error connecting to the server o.0. aka it can’t connect to the server(source). Self explanatory tbh o.0
